result.arabic_text: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا
result.translation: 104. firqawnaa kee kay qande badal xuumusnek lakal israa-iil xaylok misraa kee shaam deqsitta baaxol dabqah gaca keenik inne, tokkel ellecaboh ayro (Qhiyaamah ayroh kinnuk) xagni yamaate waqdi inkih tikki ittaanamak agleh anuk sin magooqak ballaaqâ (Macsar booxa kinnuk) fanah sin baahenno cisab kee galtoh.
